suites.name: Full Persona Run
suites.description: Complete user research session combining three specialized testing methodologies in sequence.
suites.preTestInstructions: This is a comprehensive user research session that will guide you through three sequential phases: click testing, memory recall, and workflow exploration. Please participate fully in each phase and think aloud throughout the process.

postTestQuestions.question: How comprehensive was this research experience?
Which phase was most valuable for understanding your needs?
What additional insights would you like to share?
